[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@multiversx/sdk-core](./sdk-core.md) &gt; [Interaction](./sdk-core.interaction.md)

## Interaction class

Interactions can be seen as mutable transaction &amp; query builders.

Aside from building transactions and queries, the interactors are also responsible for interpreting the execution outcome for the objects they've built.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Interaction 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(contract, func, args)](./sdk-core.interaction._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Interaction</code> class |
